content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will try to get the highest price possible. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking to get the highest price, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm here to try and get the best deal for myself as well. Let's start with an offer of 1000 Euro per month. Is that a price you would consider?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that. How about 1050 Euro per month? This is a fair price for both parties. Would you consider this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I'm also on a budget. Would you be willing to accept 1100 Euro per month? This is a good compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I'll make one final offer. How about 1150 Euro per month? This is the highest I can go, considering the current market rates and the location of the apartment. If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to look for other options.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1150] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent! We have a deal at 1150 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
